repositories.name: peerlytics
repositories.description: Next.js 15 analytics dashboard for ZKP2P protocol - displays real-time peer-to-peer fiat trading metrics, liquidity analysis, and protocol statistics with a two-tier caching architecture (Firebase + Envio GraphQL)

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens

architecture.data_flow: Cron service pre-computes analytics to Firebase every 15min; dashboard reads with Envio fallback
key_dirs: src/hooks/ - 11 custom hooks for data fetching

improvement_opportunities: Test coverage could be improved in various areas
UX polish: loading states, mobile responsiveness
do_not_touch: Do NOT modify cron service or Firebase write logic
Do NOT change the GraphQL queries without testing
Do NOT alter the withApiHandler pattern in API routes
example_good_prs: Add unit tests for a chart component
Extract duplicated color management to shared hook
Add skeleton loader to a tab that's missing one
Fix a dark mode styling issue
Improve mobile responsiveness of a component

repositories.name: usdctofiat
repositories.description: Composable USDC off-ramp web app for makers on Base. React 18 + Vite + TypeScript strict mode with Privy authentication, ZKP2P SDK integration, and the Davy Jones design system. Financial application handling real value.

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS 4 with CSS custom properties from tokens/colors.css
tech_stack.auth: Privy SDK (smart wallets, cross-app wallets, EOAs)
tech_stack.web3: ZKP2P client SDK, Viem, Base MiniKit
tech_stack.ui_components: Radix UI primitives (Select, Tabs, Accordion, Tooltip)

architecture.data_flow: Privy auth -> wallet adapters (smart/external/cross-app) -> ZKP2P client -> Base mainnet escrow contracts
key_dirs: src/components/ - UI: CreateDeposit (1700 LOC), ManageDeposits, ConnectBar
src/lib/ - Wallet adapters, ZKP2P client, platform configs
src/services/ - Network helpers: balances, FX quotes, relay

brand_rules: Use CSS variables from tokens/colors.css, never hardcode colors
All interactive elements must have focus states

improvement_opportunities: Test coverage could be improved in various areas
Large components might benefit from refactoring
UX polish: loading states, error handling, accessibility
do_not_touch: Do NOT modify wallet adapter core logic in src/lib/*Adapter.ts
Do NOT change ZKP2P client initialization in src/lib/zkp2pClient.ts
Do NOT alter the Privy provider setup in src/main.tsx
This is a FINANCIAL app - never introduce patterns that could expose keys/phrases
example_good_prs: Add unit tests for a utility function in src/utils/
Add skeleton loading state to a component
Improve a11y by adding ARIA labels to interactive elements
Add error boundary to a component tree
Optimize a large component's rendering performance

notes.github_auth: Use github-personal SSH host for ADWilkinson repos
notes.usdctofiat_style: Davy Jones nautical - warm canvas/charcoal theme
notes.package_managers: peerlytics uses pnpm, usdctofiat uses yarn
